trans-unit.source: Represents the base object type for a table entity in the Table service.
trans-unit.target: Represents the base object type for a table entity in the Table service.

trans-unit.source: <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity</codeEntityReference> provides a base implementation for the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity</codeEntityReference> interface that provides <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity.ReadEntity(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityProperty},Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity.WriteEntity(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> methods that by default serialize and deserialize all properties via reflection.
trans-unit.target: <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity</codeEntityReference> provides a base implementation for the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity</codeEntityReference> interface that provides <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity.ReadEntity(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityProperty},Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableEntity.WriteEntity(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> methods that by default serialize and deserialize all properties via reflection.

trans-unit.source: A table entity class may extend this class and override the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity.ReadEntity(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityProperty},Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity.WriteEntity(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> methods to provide customized or better performing serialization logic.
trans-unit.target: A table entity class may extend this class and override the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity.ReadEntity(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityProperty},Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity.WriteEntity(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext)</codeEntityReference> methods to provide customized or better performing serialization logic.
